message:
السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته 
انا دلوقتي عامل ويب ابليكشن ورفعته على ال localhost والدنيا تمام والعميل بيقدر يأكسس عليه من اي كمبيوتر داخل الشبكه 
طب لو عايزه يأكسس من خارج الشبكه ؟ هو جايب static ip بس مش عارف تتظبط منين من الراوتر ولا من الجهاز زات نفسه انا شغال asp.net

data.message: You need to port forward :) it's in your router
or just deploy it on Heruko =D. not sure about .net support there.

For .Net there is AppHarbor (just like Heroku)
But anyways, yes you need to forward port 80, and you need to configure the bindings in IIS, an easy way is to bind to *:80 (any hostname request on port 80), but of course this will prevent you from having any other website running on IIS on port 80
how to forward this port from router?

I had 3Com and my ISP is TE data. What happened is I had to define a Virtual Lan with the static IP, and then bound this VLan to one of the router ports. The server connects to this port and the server should be configured to use the static IP on that interface. TE data support should be able to help you for your router, they did for me. Hope this helps!

yeah before doing port forwarding you have to make your local/internal IP static (even if you have a static external IP), on my SpeedTouch router it was as easy as checking a box, other routers are not as easy.

i have made all steps (port forwarding) but not work with me 
where i write the static ip , subnetmask and getway that i obtained from ISP
Amir Mohamed Atia did you check my comment above?

Ahmed Aboulenein i have worked with port forwarding 
i and i will try your  way
Wael Eid He said he has a static IP :)

شكرا ليكم يا شباب
تمام انا وصلت للموضوع واشتغل الحمد لله وهقول الخطواط علشان لو حد احتاجها بعد كده
1- فيه حاجة اسمها secodary ip في الراوتر بندخل فيها ال getway وال subnet mask
بتوع ال static ip 
2- بثبت ال static ip بتاع الشركة ده على جهاز الكمبيوتر 
3- بفعل ال dmz من الراوتر وبدخل فيه ال  static ip وما احتاجتش ال pord forward

yes you can do dmz instead of port forwarding, but this will forward all ports to that PC, you can't optionally forward other ports to other PCs in the network with this configuration, but maybe that's not a problem in your case, sorry for not mentioning it.

Hassan Aly Selim
تمام يعني انا لو عايز استخدم ال static ip ده واكسس بيه على اكتر من كمبيوتر استخدم ال port forward ؟؟؟؟
حاولت اعملها ومظبطتش معايا ومش بيأكسس على حاجة خالص

then you haven't configured the port forwarding correctly, you need to have both source and destination port set to 80 (if it requires a range then from 80 to 80), and if you have a trigger port option leave it empty.
you might also need to prevent the router from showing it's config page if accessed remotely, since that is also served over port 80
